name: COVID19VaccineCodesForExposureIdentification
title: COVID19 vaccine codes for exposure identification
purpose: (Clinical Focus: COVID-19 vaccine codes for identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Procedure/Intervention, Immunization, Medication, or Substance.),(Inclusion Criteria: COVID-19 vaccine codes, including CPT, RxNorm, and CVX.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
